languages.text: {n}Женщина смотрит на вас со злорадной усмешкой.{/n} "Когда-то ты {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallAlly}помешал{mf||а} мне навести здесь порядок{/d}. Но я, как видишь, все равно вершу правосудие. Жаль, что мне не удалось приступить раньше — тогда смутьяны Владайма уже давно были бы раздавлены, а не продолжали бы скрываться от меня в грузовых отсеках и на технических палубах. Впрочем, вскоре я все равно расправлюсь с ними".

{n}She looks at you with a gloating smirk.{/n} "Once, you {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallAlly}hindered my efforts to subdue this station{/d}. And yet here I am now, dispensing justice to the wicked. I only regret that I was unable to begin sooner — then Tocara's troublemakers would have already been crushed, instead of lurking in cargo bays and maintenance tunnels. Regardless, I will deal with them soon enough."
languages.original_text: {n}Женщина смотрит на вас со злорадной усмешкой.{/n} "Когда-то ты {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallAlly}помешал{mf||а} мне навести здесь порядок{/d}. Но я, как видишь, все равно вершу правосудие. Жаль, что мне не удалось приступить раньше — тогда смутьяны Владайма уже давно были бы раздавлены, а не продолжали бы скрываться от меня в грузовых отсеках и на технических палубах. Впрочем, вскоре я все равно расправлюсь с ними".

I only regret that I was unable to get started sooner — then Tocara's troublemakers would have already been crushed instead of lurking in cargo bays and maintenance tunnels. Regardless, I will deal with them soon enough."

languages.text: {n}她看着你，脸上挂着得意洋洋的笑容。{/n}“你曾打算{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallAlly}阻止我控制这座星站{/d}，可现在，我却站在这里，将那些罪人绳之以法。唯一令我感到遗憾的，便是我没能更早开始这场净化。如果我当初能早点动手的话，托卡拉手下那些恶徒早就被一网打尽了，根本没机会躲到货舱和维修管道里。总之，我很快就会把他们解决掉。”
languages.original_text: {n}She looks at you with a gloating smirk.{/n} "Once, you {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallAlly}hindered my efforts to subdue this station{/d}. And yet here I am now, dispensing justice to the wicked. I only regret that I was unable to begin sooner — then Tocara's troublemakers would have already been crushed, instead of lurking in cargo bays and maintenance tunnels. Regardless, I will deal with them soon enough."

traits.locale_text: {n}她看着你，脸上挂着得意洋洋的笑容。{/n}“你曾打算阻止我控制这座星站，可现在，我却站在这里，讲那些罪人绳之以法。唯一令我感到遗憾的，便是我没能更早开始这场净化。如果我当初能早点动手的话，托卡拉手下那些恶徒早就被一网打尽了，根本没机会躲到货舱和维修管道里。总之，我很快就会把他们解决掉。”
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: {n}彼女は勝ち誇ったような顔で、あなたを見る。{/n}「お前は一度、{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallAlly}このステーションを制圧する邪魔をした{/d}。だが、今の私を見てみろ。不道徳な者を執行している。もう少し早く始めていれば、という後悔だけはあるが…もしそうしていれば、トカラの問題児たちは貨物室や整備用トンネル潜むことはなく、すでに潰されていただろうし。いずれにしろ、近い将来奴らを処分するつもりだが」
languages.original_text: {n}She looks at you with a gloating smirk.{/n} "Once, you {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallAlly}hindered my efforts to subdue this station{/d}. And yet here I am now, dispensing justice to the wicked. I only regret that I was unable to begin sooner — then Tocara's troublemakers would have already been crushed, instead of lurking in cargo bays and maintenance tunnels. Regardless, I will deal with them soon enough."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼女は勝ち誇ったような顔で、あなたを見る。{/n}「お前は一度、{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallAlly}このステーションを制圧する邪魔をした{/d}。だが、今の私を見てみろ。不道徳な者を執行している。もう少し早く始めていれば、という後悔だけはあるが…もしそうしていれば、トカラの問題児たちは貨物室や整備用トンネル潜むことはなく、すでに潰されていただろうし。いずれにしろ、近い将来奴らを処分するつもりだが」
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: {n}Te mira sonriendo con regodeo.{/n} «Hace tiempo {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallAlly}obstaculizó mis esfuerzos para someter a esta estación{/d} y, sin embargo, aquí estoy, impartiendo justicia. Lo único que lamento es no haber podido empezar antes, los alborotadores de Tocara ya habrían sido aplastados en lugar de estar merodeando por las bahías de carga y los túneles de mantenimiento. De todas maneras, pronto me encargaré de ellos».
languages.original_text: {n}She looks at you with a gloating smirk.{/n} "Once, you {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallAlly}hindered my efforts to subdue this station{/d}. And yet here I am now, dispensing justice to the wicked. I only regret that I was unable to begin sooner — then Tocara's troublemakers would have already been crushed, instead of lurking in cargo bays and maintenance tunnels. Regardless, I will deal with them soon enough."

traits.locale_text: {n}Te mira sonriendo con regodeo.{/n} «Hace tiempo obstaculizó mis esfuerzos para someter a esta estación y, sin embargo, aquí estoy, impartiendo justicia. Lo único que lamento es no haber podido empezar antes, los alborotadores de Tocara ya habrían sido aplastados en lugar de estar merodeando por las bahías de carga y los túneles de mantenimiento. De todas maneras, pronto me encargaré de ellos».
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: {n}Sie blickt dich mit einem prahlerischen Grinsen an.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallAlly}Ihr habt meine Versuche, diese Station zu bändigen, einst behindert{/d}. Und doch bin ich nun hier und urteile über die Bösen. Ich bedauere nur, dass ich nicht früher beginnen konnte. Dann wären Tocaras Unruhestifter bereits vernichtet, anstatt sich in Frachtmodulen und Wartungstunneln versteckt zu halten. Aber ich werde sie schon sehr bald eliminieren."
languages.original_text: {n}She looks at you with a gloating smirk.{/n} "Once, you {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallAlly}hindered my efforts to subdue this station{/d}. And yet here I am now, dispensing justice to the wicked. I only regret that I was unable to begin sooner — then Tocara's troublemakers would have already been crushed, instead of lurking in cargo bays and maintenance tunnels. Regardless, I will deal with them soon enough."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sie blickt dich mit einem prahlerischen Grinsen an.{/n} "Ihr habt meine Versuche, diese Station zu bändigen, einmal behindert. Und doch bin ich nun hier und urteile über die Bösen. Ich bedauere nur, dass ich nicht früher beginnen konnte. Dann wären Tocaras Unruhestifter bereits vernichtet, anstatt sich in Frachtmodulen und Wartungstunneln versteckt zu halten. Aber ich werde sie schon sehr bald eliminieren."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: {n}Elle vous regarde avec un sourire satisfait.{/n} « Malgré vos efforts pour {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallAlly}m'empêcher de soumettre cette station{/d}, je suis toujours là et je continue à traduire la racaille en justice. Mon seul regret est de ne pas avoir pu commencer plus tôt ; les truands de Tocara auraient déjà été anéantis, au lieu de rôder sur les quais de marchandises et dans les tunnels de maintenance. Mais peu importe... Je m'occuperai d'eux bien assez tôt. »
languages.original_text: {n}She looks at you with a gloating smirk.{/n} "Once, you {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallAlly}hindered my efforts to subdue this station{/d}. And yet here I am now, dispensing justice to the wicked. I only regret that I was unable to begin sooner — then Tocara's troublemakers would have already been crushed, instead of lurking in cargo bays and maintenance tunnels. Regardless, I will deal with them soon enough."

traits.locale_text: {n}Elle vous regarde avec un sourire satisfait.{/n} « Malgré vos efforts pour m'empêcher de soumettre cette station, je suis toujours là et je continue à traduire la racaille en justice. Mon seul regret est de ne pas avoir pu commencer plus tôt ; les truands de Tocara auraient déjà été anéantis, au lieu de rôder sur les quais de marchandises et dans les tunnels de maintenance. Enfin, peu importe... Je m'occuperai d'eux bien assez tôt. »
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: {n}Sana düşmanca bir gülümsemeyle bakıyor.{/n} "Bir keresinde {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallAlly}bu istasyonu hizaya getirme çabalarıma engel olmuştun{/d}. Yine de buradayım, kötülüklerin adaletin karşısına çıkmasını sağlıyorum. Tek pişmanlığım ise daha önce başlayamamış olmam. Öyle yapabilseydim Tocara'nın haydutları, kargo bölmelerinde ve bakım tünellerinde gizlenmek yerine çoktan bertaraf edilmiş olurdu. Neyse ki çok yakında onlarla da ilgileneceğim."
languages.original_text: {n}She looks at you with a gloating smirk.{/n} "Once, you {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallAlly}hindered my efforts to subdue this station{/d}. And yet here I am now, dispensing justice to the wicked. I only regret that I was unable to begin sooner — then Tocara's troublemakers would have already been crushed, instead of lurking in cargo bays and maintenance tunnels. Regardless, I will deal with them soon enough."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sana düşmanca bir gülümsemeyle bakıyor.{/n} "Bir keresinde {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallAlly}bu istasyonu hizaya getirme çabalarıma engel olmuştun{/d}. Ve yine de işte buradayım ve kötülüklerin adaletin karşısına çıkmasını sağlıyorum. Tek pişmanlığım daha önce başlayamamış olmam. Öyle yapabilseydim Tocara'nın haydutları, kargo bölmelerinde ve bakım tünellerinde gizlenmek yerine, çoktan bertaraf edilmişlerdi. Neyse, onlarla da çok yakında ilgileneceğim."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda
